definitions.definition: To do enough for; to meet the needs of; to fulfill the wishes or requirements of.
definitions.example: I'm not satisfied with the quality of the food here.

definitions.definition: To cause (a sentence) to be true when the sentence is interpreted in one's universe.
To convince by ascertaining; to free from doubt.
To pay to the extent of what is claimed or due.
To answer or discharge (a claim, debt, legal demand, etc.); to give compensation for.
definitions.example: to satisfy a claim or an execution
